nodes.text: The LL-30 blaster pistol was a type of blaster pistol used in the galaxy. During the Clone Wars, the bounty hunter Cad Bane wielded a pair of LL-30s. It made a noticeably higher pitched noise, when fired compared to most blasters. The LL-30s were characteristic for their long barrels and scope, which was unusual for a blaster pistol.[source?]
